caption:
Table 1: Comparison in terms of test MAE on The Materials Project dataset. To make the comparison 
clear and fair, We show results from retrained models using exactly the same training, validation, and 
test sets. Results from original papers are shown in Appendix A.5. The best results are shown in bold 
and the second best results are shown with underlines.

applied to crystals. Compared with Graphormer, Matformer is specifically designed for crystals 
considering both periodic invariance and periodic patterns.
